title: Moncton council OKs rezoning for school, but with conditions for province
description: Moncton councillors were prepared to halt approval of a large new school after neighbours voiced concerns at a public hearing Monday about privacy, security and drainage.
content: Moncton councillors were prepared to halt approval of a large new school after neighbours voiced concerns at a public hearing Monday about privacy security and drainage Council ultimately approved the rezoning of vacant land at McLaughlin Dr from res chars
